content: All the preparations have landed in mathlib! I heartily invite reviewers to take a look at this PR.
I think this looks great now. @Reid Barton did you want to have a look at this one too?
Yes, I have some comments, but I am otherwise preoccupied at the moment
@Reid Barton Any other comments on this one?
This PR was merged! It was opened on October 16th but was blocked by various issues that Lean 3 and mathlib used to have. I don't care about this theorem but it still feels like great news.
In this case I don't think there were issues with lean itself, but certainly mathlib got some refactors ([fact p.prime] and notations for bigops) as prelims for this PR.
That said, I'm very happy that this PR is now merged.
I care about this theorem so for me it's even better news :D
